MINNEAPOLIS  --   A Minnesota man confessed Tuesday to abducting and killing    Jacob Wetterling nearly 27 years ago, putting to rest a mystery that had haunted the state and led to changes in national sex offender laws.
(CNN) Danny James Heinrich told a Minnesota court on Tuesday that    Jacob Wetterling had one question 27 years ago when he was kidnapping him on a rural road: "What did I do wrong?"
